thread.title: 3|SHARE Releases SWIFT™ – An Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) Quick Start
thread.title_full: 3|SHARE Releases SWIFT™ – An Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) Quick Start

author: Press Release
title: 3|SHARE Releases SWIFT™ – An Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) Quick Start
text:
3|SHARE, an Adobe Specialized AEM Solution Partner and leading Adobe Digital Marketing service provider announced the launch of SWIFT, An AEM Quick Start for Sites and Assets. The service allows 3|SHARE to deploy AEM faster and at a lower price point than a traditional deployment. “Through a combination of proprietary deployment automation and a deep understanding AEM use-case commonalities we’ve managed to substantially compress the amount if time it takes deploy AEM, “ remarked Ira Lessack, Vice President of Client Services at 3|SHARE. “This significantly reduces risk while generating a rapid return on investment.”
Using the SWIFT methodology, 3|SHARE focused on the following areas during a Sites or Assets implementation:
1. Advise & Plan: Understand how AEM will work to meet a client’s unique need.
2. Design & Build: Leveraging deployment automation, base use-case extension, and a deep AEM skill-set 3|SHARE meets the needs of the business.
3. Deploy: SWIFT deploys in less than 12 weeks for Sites and 10 weeks for Assets.
4. Support: Built on best practices, SWIFT ensures maximum scalability, upgrade-ability, and support.
For more information on SWIFT – An AEM Quick Start, contact 3|SHARE at swift(at)3sharecorp(dot)com
About 3|SHARE:
3|SHARE is a Premier Level Adobe Systems Solution Partner, leading service provider of AEM, and a member of Adobe’s Partner Advisory Board. Focused solely on the Adobe Digital Marketing Suite, 3|SHARE is set apart from other firms by its highly skilled consultants, innovative tools and unparalleled commitment to client success. Headquartered in Carlsbad, CA, 3|SHARE specializes in consulting, training, and remote operation management for clients throughout North America. 3|SHARE is a member the Publicis Groupe family of companies. More information at http://www.3sharecorp.com
